response.title: Senior Frontend Developer
response.description: We are looking for a Senior Frontend Developer who will be responsible for building and maintaining web applications. Our ideal candidate has extensive experience with React, Redux, and modern frontend build pipelines and tools. As a Senior Frontend Developer, you will work closely with our design and backend teams to create high-quality user interfaces and web applications.
requirements: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with responsive and adaptive design
Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that applications will adhere to them
Familiarity with code versioning tools such as Git
benefits: Generous vacation and paid time off policy
